com.aheaditec.wrapper.interfaces

Interface CardReader


  • public interface CardReader

    Every reader type should implement this interface so they have unified API. This interface contains basic methods reader should have and provides common super type for all readers. Also, provides method to get basic card connection interface which can be used to access the card directly using basic APDU communication.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnectReader()
      Method disconnects reader.
      void getBatteryLevel(OnBatteryLevelListener listener)
      Returns integer value of remaining battery level for connected smartcard reader.
      CardConnection getCardProvider()
      Returns implementation of CardConnection interface which can be used to directly talk to smartcard using APDU commands.
      void isCardInserted(OnCardStateListener listener)
      Method check if card is currently inserted in the reader.
      boolean isConnected()
      Checks if this instance of CardReader is connected to a reader.

    • Method Detail

      • getCardProvider

        @NonNull
CardConnection getCardProvider()

        Returns implementation of CardConnection interface which can be used to directly talk to smartcard using APDU commands. For more information, refer to CardConnection Javadoc.

        Returns:
        Instance of CardConnection implementation.

      • getBatteryLevel

        void getBatteryLevel(@NonNull
                     OnBatteryLevelListener listener)

        Returns integer value of remaining battery level for connected smartcard reader. This value can either represent real current value of battery in the reader or some predetermined value for HIGH or LOW battery. Exact behaviour depends on the reader and it's own API. Please refer to official reader documentation for details.

        Parameters:
        listener - Listener returning result of the call.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()

        Checks if this instance of CardReader is connected to a reader.

        Returns:
        Boolean true if reader is connected, false otherwise.

      • isCardInserted

        void isCardInserted(@NonNull
                    OnCardStateListener listener)
        Method check if card is currently inserted in the reader.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener returning result of the call.

      • disconnectReader

        void disconnectReader()

        Method disconnects reader.
